00003 namespace bolt;
00004 use \b as b;
00005 
00006 // plug
00007 b::plug('cookie', '\bolt\cookie');
00008 
00009 class cookie extends plugin\singleton {
00010 
00011     ////////////////////////////////////////////////
00012     /// @brief add url params to a url
00013     ///
00014     /// @param $url base url
00015     /// @param $params array of params to add
00016     /// 
00017     /// @return string url with additional params
00018     ////////////////////////////////////////////////
00019   public static function setCookie($name, $value, $expires=false, $domain=false) {
00020   
00021     // domain
00022     $domain = b::config()->get("cookies/domain");
00023   
00024     // get name from config
00025     if ( substr($name, 0, 1) == '$' ) {
00026       $name = self::_(substr($name, 1));
00027     }
00028   
00029     // is value a string
00030     if ( is_array($value) ) {
00031     
00032       // see if this cookie already exists
00033       if ( p($name, false, $_COOKIE) ) {
00034         
00035         // merge the values from the current cookie
00036         $value = self::mergeArray( self::getCookie($name), $value );
00037         
00038       }
00039       
00040       // encode it
00041       $e = base64_encode(json_encode($value));
00042     
00043       // return the padded value
00044       $value = ":".self::md5($e).$e;
00045       
00046     }
00047     
00048     // expires
00049     if ( $expires AND $expires < self::utctime() ) {
00050       $expires = self::utctime() + $expires;
00051     }
00052   
00053     // set it 
00054     setcookie($name, $value, $expires, '/', $domain);
00055   
00056   }
00057   
00058   public static function deleteCookie($name) {
00059 
00060     // domain
00061     $domain = self::_('site/cookieDomain');
00062 
00063     // get name from config
00064     if ( substr($name, 0, 1) == '$' ) {
00065       $name = self::_(substr($name, 1));
00066     }
00067 
00068     // set it 
00069     setcookie($name, false, time()+1, '/', $domain);
00070   
00071   }
00072   
00073   public static function getCookie($name) {
00074 
00075   
00076     // get name from config
00077     if ( substr($name, 0, 1) == '$' ) {
00078       $name = self::_(substr($name, 1));
00079     }
00080   
00081     // try to get it 
00082     $cookie = urldecode(p($name, false, $_COOKIE));
00083   
00084       // if we don't have it, stop
00085       if ( !$cookie ) { return false; }
00086       
00087     // see if the first val is a :
00088     if ( $cookie{0} == ':' ) {
00089               
00090       // make sure we're goof
00091       $cookie = self::getDecodedCookie($cookie);
00092       
00093     }
00094   
00095     // return it 
00096     return $cookie;
00097   
00098   }   
00099   
00100   public static function getDecodedCookie($cookie) {
00101 
00102     // split it 
00103     $sig = substr($cookie, 1, 32);
00104     
00105     // now the value
00106     $e = substr($cookie, 33);
00107     
00108     // make sure we're goof
00109     return ( self::md5($e) == $sig ? json_decode(base64_decode($e), true) : false );
00110     
00111   }
